Heading: The warning sign is missing from the electrical cabinet
Observation: The door of the electrical cabinet is completely missing a warning marking. The locker is located in a public passage area.

Heading: Water leaked from the coffee machine
Observation: Water had leaked directly onto the floor on the lower level of the coffee machine in the office space. I also noticed that liquid had been splashed near the electrical outlet, which posed a potential safety risk.

Heading: Socket at the front door in a dangerous space
Observation: The socket at the front door was hanging right on the floor and was partially broken. Potential risk of electric shock, especially during rain.

Heading: An extension cord runs across the hallway
Observation: In the office corridor, an extension cord had been pulled across the floor between two workstations. Tripping hazard and risk of damage to the cord.

Heading: Electrical cabinet open in the production area
Observation: The electrical distribution cabinet in the production facility had been left open unattended. There were no warning labels or protection in the cabinet.

Heading: Damaged electrical cord
Observation: A damaged electrical cable was found in the warehouse, the insulation of which had worn out in several places, with the exposed wires visible.

Heading: Overloading the socket
Observation: One socket had six devices connected through a branch plug. Overload risk and fire hazard.

Heading: Wet floor near electrical appliances
Observation: After the cleaning work, the floor was wet in the immediate vicinity of electrical outlets and appliances.

Heading: Broken light switch
Observation: The light switch hung off the wall and the insides were visible. Risk of electric shock.

Heading: Damaged power cord
Observation: The insulation of the power cable of the production equipment had cracked in several places, exposing the metal conductor.

Heading: Power tools on wet floors
Observation: Battery-powered power tools had been left on the floor next to a wet area at the loading dock door.

Heading: Residual current device is missing
Observation: The socket for outdoor use lacked a residual current device, even though it is mandatory for outdoor use.

Heading: Inadequate fastening of the electrical cable
Observation: The electric cable hanging from the ceiling was attached at only one point and swayed dangerously.

Heading: Unattended charging area
Observation: There were several devices in the battery charging area charging overnight without supervision or fire safety equipment.

Heading: Goods in front of the main switchboard
Observation: Goods had been stored in front of the main switchboard, which prevented access in an emergency.

Heading: Damaged extension cord in use
Observation: An extension cord was used, the insulation of which was clearly damaged and the cord had been repaired with tape.

Heading: Humidity in the electrical cabinet
Observation: Moisture and rust marks were detected in the electrical cabinet in the basement.

Heading: Using electrical appliances outdoors in the rain
Observation: A person operated a power tool outdoors in heavy rain without proper protection.

Heading: Socket cover broken
Observation: The protective cover of the workstation socket was cracked and the internal parts were partially visible.

Heading: UPS Device Warns of Fault
Observation: The UPS device in the server room gave a continuous warning sound, but the device had not been serviced.

Heading: Electrical cabinet unlocked
Observation: The electrical distribution cabinet in the production facility was unlocked, even though it should be locked to prevent unauthorized access.

Heading: Wrong plug in use
Observation: The appliance had the wrong type of plug that did not fit properly into the socket.

Heading: Electrical work without a permit
Observation: It was noticed that the person was doing electrical installation work without the appropriate permit or qualifications.

Heading: Indoor generator
Observation: The backup power generator was placed indoors without adequate ventilation.

Heading: Electrical equipment cord pinched
Observation: Under the heavy shelf, the power cord of electrical appliances was pinched.

Heading: Removing the lamp cover
Observation: The protective cover of the ceiling lamp was detached and hanging from wires.

Heading: Engine overheated
Observation: The electric motor of the production unit was overheated and smelled of burnt smell.

Heading: Electrical panel markings are missing
Observation: The electrical panel lacked all markings, so it was impossible to identify the fuses and switches.

Heading: Plug contact surfaces visible
Observation: The plastic casing of the plug was cracked and the metal contact surfaces were partially visible.

Heading: Temporary electrical installation remains permanent
Observation: The electrical installation, which was intended to be temporary, had been in use for more than a year without an official inspection.

Heading: Electrical appliances in dusty environments
Observation: The electrical equipment was in a very dusty environment without proper protection.

Heading: Unplug the ground wire
Observation: The ground wire of the device was disconnected from the connection point.

Heading: Electrical cabinet rusted
Observation: The outdoor electrical distribution cabinet was badly rusted and its seals were broken.

Heading: Lamps flicker
Observation: The lights in the office space are constantly flickering, which indicates an electrical problem.

Heading: Charging batteries in an unsafe space
Observation: Lithium batteries were charged in a storage facility without fire safety equipment or supervision.

Heading: Neglected maintenance of electrical equipment
Observation: The scheduled maintenance of the production equipment was delayed by three months.

Heading: Insufficient number of sockets
Observation: There were too few sockets at the workstation, which led to the chaining of the splitters.

Heading: The route of the electric cable is dangerous
Observation: The electric cable ran across the forklift aisle without protection.

Heading: Water dripping from the lamp
Observation: Water was dripping from the ceiling lamp, which indicates a water leak and an electrical safety risk.

Heading: Emergency stop button covered
Observation: The plane's emergency stop button was partially covered with items.

Heading: The electric motor makes abnormal noises
Observation: The electric motor of the production unit made an abnormal noise, which may indicate a fault.

Heading: Socket installation incorrect
Observation: The new socket had been installed incorrectly and it was loose in the wall.

Heading: Electrical appliances too close to a water source
Observation: The electrical appliances had been placed too close to the water point without observing safety distances.

Heading: Cable channel full
Observation: The cable duct was full of wires, which could cause overheating.

Heading: Using a power tool without training
Observation: The person used a power tool for which he was not trained.

Heading: Lamp attachment is weak
Observation: The attachment of the work lamp was weak and the lamp wobbled dangerously.

Heading: Instructions for using electrical appliances are missing
Observation: The new electrical appliances lacked instructions for use and safety markings in Finnish.

Heading: The residual current device trips repeatedly
Observation: The residual current device in a certain area trips repeatedly, indicating a problem with the power grid.

Heading: Electrical panel ventilation blocked
Observation: The ventilation holes of the electrical panel were blocked with dust and dirt.

Heading: Portable charger cord damaged
Observation: The laptop charger cord was badly damaged and the internal wires were visible.
